author: JamesWTruher
body:
this is a fix for https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3069
and removes an attempt to work-around the issue of tests hanging on Travis-CI.

The hanging tests in Travis-CI have now been seen in a number of places, getting a dump during this condition has been problematic.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Test hang again in Linux CI. I restarted the CI.

title: Remove async tests for parser
